response.original_title: Tiernan Douieb: The World Is Full of Idiots, Let's Live in Space
response.overview: Tiernan reflects on astronaut Chris Hadfield's belief that the world is all one place and we're all one people living together on it...so why do we have to send people quite so far away to have that realisation...and just how feasible is it to fire a large portion of the world into space until they behave?
response.title: Tiernan Douieb: The World Is Full of Idiots, Let's Live in Space
